name: ObjectFrontier
tag_list: software-development-company, commercial-grade-software, offshore-and-outsourced-product-development, software-product-engineering, legacy-product-maintenance, banking-solutions, software-testing-mobile-development-app, android, blackberry, windows
overview:
ObjectFrontier (OFS) helps software companies and software-enabled businesses to design, develop, test, and maintain their software products and applications, whether they are hosted, licensed or mobile.

Description: Based in Atlanta and with offices spread across DC, New York, Philadelphia, India, and the Philippines, we have earned the trust of both large and small software firms catering to various industries including healthcare, financial services and hospitality that have partnered with us for over 15 years Our customers are independent Software Vendors (ISVs) and F1000 companies whose revenues are driven primarily from customer-facing software products. We have a large and growing mobile apps division that is building mobile software for medium and large corporations looking to empower their workforce with the latest technology in iPad, Android and other mobile platforms to help them interact with customers and systems in new and innovative ways while on the move. OFS takes on the entire life-cycle of software product development, maintenance, quality assurance testing, and support, all while keeping the costs low. Website: www.objectfrontier.com

external_links.title: Knowing Mobile Enterprise to Take The Right Decision For Your Organization
